json_config_file.Description: Retrieve the provider configuration from this JSON file

logging.Description: Logging options for the API connection

port.Description: If the port is non-standard for the protocol, the port number to use

timeout.Description: The timeout in seconds for all communications with Prisma Cloud

url.Description: The API URL without the leading protocol

delay_notification_ms.Description: Delay notifications by the specified milliseconds

excluded_policies.Description: List of policies to exclude from scan

notification_config.Description: List of data for notifications to third-party tools

last_sent_ts.Description: Time of last notification in milliseconds

recipients.Description: List of unique email addresses to notify

policies.Description: List of specific policies to scan

values.Description: List of values for resource tag key

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

ram_arn.Description: Unique identifier for an Alibaba RAM role resource

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

role_arn.Description: Unique identifier for an AWS resource (ARN)

client_id.Description: Application ID registered with Active Directory

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

service_principal_id.Description: Unique ID of the service principal object associated with the Prisma Cloud application that you create

tenant_id.Description: Active Directory ID associated with Azure

credentials_json.Description: Content of the JSON credentials file

dataflow_enabled_project.Description: GCP project for flow log compression

enabled.Description: Whether or not the account is enabled

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

name.Description: Name to be used for the account on the Prisma Cloud platform (must be unique)

cloud_types.Description: Cloud type (determined based on policies assigned)

integration_config.Description: Integration configuration, the values depend on the integration type

auth_token.Description: PagerDuty authentication token for the event collector

base_url.Description: Qualys Security Operations Center server API URL (without "http(s)")

queue_url.Description: The Queue URL you used when you configured Prisma Cloud in Amazon SQS

tables.Description: Key/value pairs that identify the ServiceNow module tables with which to integrate (e.g. - incident, sn_si_incident, or em_event)

reason.Description: Model for the integration status details

compliance_metadata.Description: List of compliance data. Each item has compliance standard, requirement, and/or section information

criteria.Description: Saved search ID that defines the rule criteria

rule_type.Description: Type of rule or RQL query

system_default.Description: If policy is a system default policy or not

associated_users.Description: Associated application users which cannot exist in the system without the user role

alert_rules.Description: Singly associated alert rules which cannot exist in the system without the account group

delay_notification_ms.Description: Delay notifications by the specified milliseconds

excluded_policies.Description: List of policies to exclude from scan

notification_config.Description: List of data for notifications to third-party tools

last_sent_ts.Description: Time of last notification in milliseconds

recipients.Description: List of unique email addresses to notify

policies.Description: List of specific policies to scan

values.Description: List of values for resource tag key

policies.Description: List of specific policies to scan

operator.Description: Operator between the name and value params

limit.Description: Max number of alerts to return.  This uses the v2 version of the API, where the default and max is 10,000.

sort_by.Description: Array of sort properties. Append :asc or :desc to the key to sort by ascending or descending order respectively.

to_now.Description: From some time in the past to now

group_ids.Description: List of account IDs to which you are assigning this account

section_count.Description: Number of system supported and custom compliance standard requirement sections

listing.Description: List of all compliance requirement sections

total.Description: Total number of system supported and custom compliance standard requirement sections
Total number of system supported and custom appliance standard requirements

listing.Description: List of system supported and custom compliance standards

cloud_types.Description: Cloud type (determined based on policies assigned)

total.Description: Total number of system supported and custom compliance standards

integration_config.Description: Integration configuration, the values depend on the integration type

auth_token.Description: PagerDuty authentication token for the event collector

base_url.Description: Qualys Security Operations Center server API URL (without "http(s)")

queue_url.Description: The Queue URL you used when you configured Prisma Cloud in Amazon SQS

tables.Description: Key/value pairs that identify the ServiceNow module tables with which to integrate (e.g. - incident, sn_si_incident, or em_event)

reason.Description: Model for the integration status details

system_default.Description: If the policy is a system default for Prisma Cloud

rule_type.Description: Type of rule or RQL query

system_default.Description: If policy is a system default policy or not

saved.Description: If this is a saved search

limit.Description: Max number of historic RQL searches to return

saved.Description: If this is a saved search

total.Description: Total number of RQL saved searches
